control.util

Class CryptToolbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.util.CryptToolbox

  • public final class CryptToolbox
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class CryptToolbox is a collection cryptographic functions or functions needed to start a successful encryption.

    • Constructor Summary

      CryptToolbox()

      • threadEncryptFileAesCTR

        public static java.io.File threadEncryptFileAesCTR(java.io.File srcFile,
                                   java.lang.String dstPath,
                                   byte[] key)
                                            throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                   java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                                   javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                                   java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                   java.io.IOException,
                                                   java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        A threadable function which encrypts the given file AES in CTR mode and saves the cipher in given destination.
        Parameters:
        srcFile - the file to encrypt
        dstPath - the destination of cipher
        key - the encryption key
        Returns:
        the encrypted file
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - the no such provider exception
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - the no such padding exception
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the invalid key exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - the invalid algorithm parameter exception

      • encryptByteArrayAesCTR

        public static byte[] encryptByteArrayAesCTR(byte[] input,
                            byte[] key)
                                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                            java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                            javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                            java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                            javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                            javax.crypto.ShortBufferException,
                                            javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                            java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Encrypts a byte array with AES in CTR mode and returns the encrypted array with the initialization vector added to the end.
        Parameters:
        input - the byte array to encrypt
        key - the encryption key
        Returns:
        the encrypted cipher and the initialization vector.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - the no such provider exception
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - the no such padding exception
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the invalid key exception
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - the illegal block size exception
        javax.crypto.ShortBufferException - the short buffer exception
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - the bad padding exception
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - the invalid algorithm parameter exception

      • decryptByteArrayAesCTR

        public static byte[] decryptByteArrayAesCTR(byte[] input,
                            byte[] key)
                                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                            java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                            javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                            java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                            javax.crypto.ShortBufferException,
                                            javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                            javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                            java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Decrypts a byte array with AES in CTR mode on which the initialization vector is added to the end.
        Parameters:
        input - the byte array with the cipher and the initialization vector.
        key - the decryption key
        Returns:
        the decrypted data
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - the no such provider exception
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - the no such padding exception
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the invalid key exception
        javax.crypto.ShortBufferException - the short buffer exception
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - the illegal block size exception
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - the bad padding exception
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - the invalid algorithm parameter exception

      • encryptAndUploadFileCTR

        public static InformationContainer encryptAndUploadFileCTR(java.io.File selectedFile)
                                                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                           java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                           java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                                           javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                           java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Encrypts file AES in CTR mode and uploads it by creating a thread for this costly tasks.
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - the selected file
        Returns:
        a information container of the given and now encrypted file
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the invalid key exception
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - the no such provider exception
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - the no such padding exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - the invalid algorithm parameter exception

      • downloadAndDecryptFileCTR

        public static void downloadAndDecryptFileCTR(InformationContainer informationContainer)
        Downloads a file and decrypts it AES in CTR mode by creating a thread for this costly tasks. The decrypted plain file is saved in the users download directory.
        Parameters:
        informationContainer - the information container of selected file

      • generateRandomBytes

        public static byte[] generateRandomBytes(int length)
        Generate random bytes. Generated a byte array of securely generated random bits in the given length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of returned byte array
        Returns:
        the random bytes

      • generateLocationString

        public static java.lang.String generateLocationString()
        Generate location string. Generates a string for the encrypted name of a uploaded file by a securely random function. It has the length of the Main.FILE_IDENT_LEN constant.
        Returns:
        the random generated string

                                  throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                         java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Hash byte array by SHA256.
        Parameters:
        input - the byte array to be hashed
        Returns:
        the calculated hash
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - the unsupported encoding exception

      • expandUserPassword

        public static byte[] expandUserPassword(java.lang.String password,
                        int len)
        Expands the users password to given length to make it usable as an encryption key.
        Parameters:
        password - the users password
        len - the desired length of the expanded password
        Returns:
        the expanded password
